search_results.title: US Stock Market Closes Higher as Investors Await Fed Decision
search_results.content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 120 points, or 0.4%, to 34,640. The S&P 500 gained 0.5% to 4,300, while the NASDAQ Composite climbed 0.7% to 13,400. Investors are awaiting the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision, expected later today.

search_results.title: Federal Reserve Keeps Interest Rates Unchanged, Cites Economic Uncertainty
search_results.content: The Federal Reserve has decided to keep interest rates unchanged, citing ongoing economic uncertainty. The decision was made during the Fed's two-day policy meeting, which concluded today.

search_results.title: S&P 500 and NASDAQ Reach New Highs as Tech Stocks Surge
search_results.content: The S&P 500 and NASDAQ Composite have reached new highs, driven by a surge in tech stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average also rose, but at a slower pace.

search_results.title: Major Earnings Announcements: Apple, Amazon, and Microsoft Report Strong Results
search_results.content: Apple, Amazon, and Microsoft have reported strong earnings results, beating analyst expectations. The tech giants' results have boosted investor confidence and driven the market higher.

search_results.title: Economic Indicators: US GDP Growth Slows to 2.1% in Q2
search_results.content: The US GDP growth has slowed to 2.1% in the second quarter, according to the Commerce Department. The slowdown is attributed to a decline in business investment and a rise in trade tensions.
